glsa.title: DokuWiki: Local file inclusion
glsa.synopsis: An input sanitation error in DokuWiki might lead to the dislosure of local files or even the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: DokuWiki is a standards compliant Wiki system written in PHP.

description.p: girex reported that data from the "config_cascade" parameter in inc/init.php is not properly sanitized before being used.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute PHP code from arbitrary local, or, when the used PHP version supports ftp:// URLs, also from remote files via FTP. Furthermore, it is possible to disclose the contents of local files. NOTE: Successful exploitation requires the PHP option "register_globals" to be enabled.
